subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie offset her mistakes with enough birdies, shooting a par 72 that left her two shots behind and in good position at the L.P.G.A. Tour qualifying tournament. Mollie Fankhauser shot a 66 on the Legends course and finished at 12-under 204. She had a one-shot lead over Japan’s Shiho Oyama, who had a 71. The 90-hole event concludes Sunday with 20 players earning their L.P.G.A. cards for 2009.
